hi!

My name is Alek and currently studying in the undergraduate CTD program, at the University of Colorado Boulder.

Born here in Boulder, CO and the typical Colorado native. Avid cyclist including mountain biking, gravel and cyclocross. Though I have never used Word for layout design again, I have continued honing and expanding my design skills to include digital, print, and motion design. I also found a love for science and space in particular after I took an astronomy class on a whim. Nowadays, I use my creative skills to communicate my passion for learning and science and to share my wonder for the world with everyone. I currently live in Boulder, CO with my cat Sourdough, and as many houseplants as I can manage to keep alive â€“ usually between 0 and 3.
